title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Curriculum Materials               Curriculum Materials       Teachers: Click here to view and use our Teaching with Historic Places Lesson Plans prior to your visit! Click here to view the Teachers Guide to the American Revolution! Teaching with Museum Collections Lesson plans bring park museum collections, interpretation and education programs into the homes and classrooms to engage learners of all ages. The American Revolution Lesson Plan draws on extraordinary museum collections featured in the online museum exhibits from four National Park Service Sites:  Valley Forge National Historical Park Independence National Historical Park Guilford Courthouse National Military Park Morristown National Historical Park
